name: Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato sauce. A beloved North Indian delicacy.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken pieces and fragrant spices. A feast in itself.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: Tender mutton cooked in a rich gravy of yogurt, aromatic spices, and caramelized onions. A Kashmiri specialty.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Juicy chicken breast marinated in lemon and herbs, grilled to perfection. Served with roasted vegetables.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: Diced chicken stir-fried with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers in a spicy sauce.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, then roasted in a tandoor. Served with mint chutney.
